name: Preserve (Twinkle Frog Studios)
description:
Learn about endangered species and their needs! 

──────────────────────🐾──────────────────────

Sally is a volunteer at an animal conservation center where she will explore and interact with different animals such as Iberian Lynxes and Harpy Eagles.
Help her solve thematic puzzle minigames and collect all the stamps, while learning more about endangered animals.

➤ Preserve’s main appeal would be its colourful and simple art-style as well as the educational element of its minigames and stamp book.

──────────────────────🐾──────────────────────

  • Learn more about endangered species such as the Iberian Lynx and Harpy Eagle.
  • Collect all of the available stamps to unlock additional information about the animals.
  • Beautifully hand-draw art and frame by frame animations.
  • Explore the vivid environment of the conservation center and meet lively animals.

──────────────────────🐾──────────────────────

──────────────────────🐾──────────────────────

Preserve is compatible with the operating system Windows. It was developed by Twinkle Frog Studios and the Explode Toad Studios for the Game Jam+ 2022. Any contributions we'll receive for Entrudo will be used to create our future games!
